price: Lalle ne waɗanda suka kãfirta kuma suka taushe (mutãne) daga hanyar Allah da masallaci mai alfarma wanda Muka sanya shi ga mutãne alhãli kuwa mazauni a ciki da baƙauye daidai suke kuma wanda ya yi nufin karkatar* da gaskiya a cikinsa da zãlunci zã Mu ɗanɗana masa daga wata azãba mai raɗadi.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَيَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡمَسۡجِدِ ٱلۡحَرَامِ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلۡنَٰهُ لِلنَّاسِ سَوَآءً ٱلۡعَٰكِفُ فِيهِ وَٱلۡبَادِۚ وَمَن يُرِدۡ فِيهِ بِإِلۡحَادِۭ بِظُلۡمٖ نُّذِقۡهُ مِنۡ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٖ
footnotes: * Ilhãdi, shĩ ne yin ibãda bã yadda Allah Ya yi umurni da a yi ta ba. Wanda ya yi nufin karkatar da gaskiyar ibãda a cikin hurumin Makka, Allah zai yi masa azãba mai tsanani,balle fa a ce mutum ya aikata. Sabõda haka yanã wajaba ga mai nufin zuwa Hajji ya kõyi yadda ake yin ibãda kãfinya tafi Makka dõmin kada ya jãwo wa kansa halaka.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna kafarū wayaṣuddūna ʿan sabīli al-lahi wal-masjidi al-ḥarāmi alladhī jaʿalnāhu lilnnāsi sawāan al-ʿākifu fīhi wal-bādi waman yurid fīhi bi-il'ḥādin biẓul'min nudhiq'hu min ʿadhābin alīmin
